group_1.textRight: …We've lost her.

group_1.textLeft: This is where Tsukuyo used to be, but now@Tsukasa isn't here either.

group_1.textRight: I'm sure this would be her destination after@you told her, but…
I wonder if she's already moved on@to somewhere else?

group_1.textLeft: …I'm so sorry, Homura.@This was all my fault.

group_1.textRight: This wasn't your fault.
I couldn't stop her either.
Let's just go back to the initial meeting place.

group_1.textLeft: Ah! It's Tsukuyo…

group_1.textRight: So she came here after being guided by us@in the first loop.

group_1.textLeft: After this, Tsukasa didn't show up at all, right?
And we waited such a long time for her.
Looks like we'll fail this mission again…

group_1.textRight: …I suppose so.

group_1.textLeft: Back then, Tsukasa…
Why didn't she stay at the meeting spot?
I've been thinking about that.
In the second loop…where we are right now,
she left because I went and put my foot@in my mouth…

group_1.textRight: Assuming that's the case, here's what I'm@worried about.
You're saying that the flow of time is still@following the first loop.
Thus, at this point, it was predetermined that@we'd have to perform a second loop.
So WE'RE the ones who told the past Tsukasa@where her sister was, causing her to leave?

group_1.textLeft: Maybe it was always meant to be this way.

group_1.textRight: It seems that even dreams must follow@certain rules.
At this point…
The actions we're currently taking are not@contradicting the events of the past.

group_1.textLeft: Hey, if we went to talk to everyone right now…
What do you think would happen?
Maybe we could all work together to find@Tsukasa…

group_1.textRight: I think that would be far too dangerous.
It didn't happen to us during the first loop.
If it WERE to happen now...
We can't predict what the outcome will be.@It may simply send time in a new direction…
But in a way, that's also rewriting our own@past actions.
Worst-case scenario, a time paradox occurs.
There's a chance we could cease to exist@if we tried.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:210000:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]WHAAAT?

group_1.textRight: That's only a hypothesis, though.
It's just…the events that were predetermined@by the first loop are happening in the second.
In other words, the past has not been changed@at all.
…Even a world of dreams still has rules.
It would be too risky to deviate from that.

group_1.textLeft: I guess so…
So then, you want us to try and find Tsukasa@on our own?

group_1.textRight: That's right.
I'm not sure we can actually find her but…

group_1.textLeft: …Okay.
We'll go find Tsukasa.
And bring her to the meeting spot.
But that's where the Madoka and Homura@from our first loop will be waiting, right?

group_1.textRight: Yeah… But since we never saw Tsukasa come@back the first time…

group_1.textLeft: That means that in the second loop…@The one we're in right now…
We're doomed to fail again this time too.
